title: Martin Luther King Jr National Historic Site: News Releases
body: News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     May 31, 2016  Preservation Campaign  In honor of the National Park Serviceâ€™s Centennial, the 2016 Partners in Preservation: National Parks campaign will award $2 million in grants to historic sites in need of preservation within national parks units, as decided by popular vote. The Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historic Site hopes to be one of the winners of the campaign.   November 26, 2014  Dr. King Nobel Peace Prize 2015  Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historic Site celebrates the 50th Anniversary of the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr., receiving the 1964 Nobel Peace Prize, with the opening of an exhibition entitled, 1964 Martin Luther King, Jr., "A Global Citizen".
